bibl.title: Funerary Aspects in the Paintings from the Apollo Monastery at Bawit.
bibl.note: Introduction. - Hunting Scenes. - The Imago Clipeata. - Men in the Fiery Furnace. - Decorative Patterns; Floral and Animal Decoration. - The Monk's Dwelling as a Tomb. - The Aspect of the Oratorium. - Conclusions.

bibl.title: Christianity and Monasticism in Middle Egypt. Al-Minya and Asyut.

bibl.seg: Karel Innemée, Funerary Aspects in the Paintings from the Apollo Monastery at Bawit.
Gawdat Gabra & Hany N. Takla (edd.), Christianity and Monasticism in Middle Egypt. Al-Minya and Asyut (Cairo - New York, 2015) pp. 241-253, 6 figg.

Introduction. - Hunting Scenes. - The Imago Clipeata. - Men in the Fiery Furnace. - Decorative Patterns; Floral and Animal Decoration. - The Monk's Dwelling as a Tomb. - The Aspect of the Oratorium. - Conclusions.
